short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and restore tabs with ease. Close tabs by range, URL, and restore recent tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabMaster Pro

Streamline your browsing with TabMaster Pro—your ultimate tab management tool for Chrome! This powerful extension allows you to efficiently manage and restore tabs, making your browsing experience smoother and more organized.

Key Features:

Close Tabs by Range: Easily close a range of tabs by specifying the start and end indices.
URL-Based Closure: Remove tabs that match a specific URL pattern for quick cleanup.
Restore Last Tab: Recover the last closed tab with a single click.
Restore All Tabs: Restore all recently closed tabs in one go, bringing back your entire browsing session.
Why Choose TabMaster Pro?

Efficient Tab Management: Keep your workspace tidy by closing multiple tabs at once or targeting specific URLs.
Quick Recovery: Instantly restore tabs you’ve closed, avoiding any loss of important information.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface with easy-to-use controls and options.
Optimize your browsing workflow and maintain a clutter-free environment with TabMaster Pro. Whether you need to tidy up or recover lost tabs, this extension has you covered.
